events.message: I received my order yesterday but the laptop screen has a huge scratch on it and it doesn't look new at all.
The issue has been categorized under product defect due to the reported screen damage on delivery.
Assigning this case to the product quality support team to handle the reported damage on the laptop screen.
Hello! I am sorry to hear about the scratch on your laptop screen. I am here to help you resolve this issue.
Could you please provide a photo of the scratched screen and confirm the order number for our records?
Here are the photos of the scratched screen attached, and the order number is 123456789.
Thank you for the details. We can either send you a replacement unit or offer a partial refund for the damage. Please let us know your preference.
I would prefer a replacement, as I want a fully functional laptop without any scratches.
A replacement laptop has been arranged and will be shipped to your address with expedited delivery.
We wanted to check if you have received the replacement laptop and if everything is satisfactory with the new device.
Yes, I received the replacement yesterday and the screen is perfect. Thanks for the quick resolution!
Glad to hear that the replacement arrived in perfect condition. We are closing this case now but feel free to reach out anytime.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to your email. We appreciate your feedback on our handling of this issue.
